fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may forage and obtain 2 *herbs*.
- At night, you may cast a spell with an herb to give a player basic defense for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may increase the amount of herbs you use in a spell, with each herb used increasing the defense provided by 1.
- If you do not take any night action, you gain 1 herb.
